title: Hacka Doll The Animation (Hackadoll The Animation)
synopsis: Hacka Dolls are AI that scan a person in order to tailor news recommendations and information to their users. These widespread, personalized robots have served many citizens, from government officials to professional sports players.
characters: ['Hacka Doll No.3', 'Hacka Doll No.2', 'Hacka Doll No.1', 'Hacka Doll No.0', 'Hacka Doll No.4', 'Mobami', 'Takayuki', 'Kirara', 'Yuppi', 'Uragami']
voices: ['Yamashita, Nanami', 'Okuno, Kaya', 'Takagi, Miyu', 'Yuzuki, Ryouka', 'Ueda, Reina', 'Tanaka, Minami', 'Shimoyamada, Ayaka', 'Tanaka, Minami', 'Aoyama, Yoshino', 'Kawanishi, Kengo']
staff: [['Usa, Yoshiki', ['Producer']], ['Geso, Ikuo', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Arai, Kazuto', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Naruse, Shuuhei', ['Music']]]
